::Zardus::

Zardus looks over at Astral, frowning slightly as he sees the other 
Dark Lavacons enter the Iron Fist, recieving Allanon's and Life's 
transmission.

"The Iron Fist is not yet available for quarters," he replies, the 
same transmission sending out to Astral's group, "The Alliance base 
will be settled in shortly, it'll still be used for residential 
pourposes."

He looks back at Astral, "Yes, an attack will be launched soon. Does 
your group wish to participate?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Dark Lavacons::
> 
>         Astral nodded.
> 
>        "Come on, were going to see Zardus," Astral said back to the 
others.
> 
>        They flew up in the air, and flew to where Zarus was, and 
hovered
> there for a second.
> 
>        Astral spoke to the others.
> 
>        "Fenox, you and the others go into the Iron Fist, and settle 
down, I
> am going to see Zardus," He ordered.
> 
>       Fenox nodded, and then he went towards the Iron Fist, the 
others
> following.  They landed and went inside, and looked around.  Their 
first
> time in a base, at least as a Dark Lavacon.
> 
>       Astral flew down to where Zardus was.
> 
>       "Greetings, Zardus.  Is there anything me and my troops may 
do for
> you?" Astral said, loyally.
